comments.author: matthew.heard
comments.text: Changes: collapsed hide-by-class helpers in src/core/browser/tags.js and documented the requirement to mark beads in progress in AGENTS.md. Commands run: npm test; npm run duplication. Outcomes: tests pass (100% coverage) and duplication now only flags existing clones in src/core/browser/localStorageLens.js. Follow-up: consider deduping localStorageLens.js in a new bead if desired.

title: Fix tsdoc:check failures
description: npm run tsdoc:check (tsc --project tsconfig.jsdoc.json) started failing because of many type mismatches across core/browser and core/cloud modules (e.g., NormalizedBlogDataDependencies vs BlogDataDependencies in src/core/browser/data.js, DOM helper shapes in src/core/browser/tags.js, and numerous inference errors in core/cloud/render-variant-core.js and submit-new-page/story helpers). Sweep these errors or relax the tsconfig so the script passes.

title: Deduplicate localStorageLens helper
description: npm run duplication (jscpd) detected copies inside src/core/browser/localStorageLens.js: [45:13-54:4] vs [92:18-102:4] and [74:4-86:4] vs [160:33-169:4]. Extract or share the repeated logic so the duplication report goes away.
